summary:
Adolf Hitler, the leader of Nazi Germany, killed himself on April 30, 1945, by shooting himself in the head. This happened in his bunker in Berlin as Germany was losing World War II. His wife, Eva Braun, also died by taking poison. Their bodies were burned in the garden. The next day, German radio announced Hitler's death.

People who saw Hitler's body said he died from the gunshot. Dental records later confirmed it was him. However, the Soviet Union shared confusing information, saying Hitler might have escaped. Germany issued a death certificate in 1956, but some people still believe in different stories about what happened.
title: Death of Adolf Hitler
